response.job_title: Customer Care Data Manager at PedidosYa
response.summary:
Computer Science and Systems Engineer.
Mastering in Data Science and Artificial intelligence.

Team management experience for teams of 40+ members.
Portfolio project management experience for 50+ projects.
Project management experience by guidelines established by PMI, on several implementation methodologies.

Knowledge in model generation and application for supervised and unsupervised machine learning.
Experience in machine learning model generation for customer classification.
Knowledge in generating artificial intelligence models for clustering classification.
Knowledge in regression models for numeric predictions based on data.
SQL experience for analyzing relational databases.
R language experience for data analysis based on machine learning algorithms application.
Python knowledge for data manipulation and analysis, based on machine learning.

English language fluency.
Portuguese language reading and listening skills.

Background in marketing campaigns and analytics, in tools such as NetSuite and Infusion.
Experience in database design, configuration and management. with tools such as PhpMyAdmin, Wamp, Xamp, DBeaver and Sybase PowerDesigner tools.
Experience in ERP and CRM  implementation, customization and also customer and project management with tools such as  NetSuite, Infusion and SalesForce.
Knowledge in responsive web and app development as a full stack developer, skills to work in front-end development (HTML, CSS, Javascript), and back-end (PHP, SQL).
Skills in e-commerce site customization in tools such as Shopiffy.
Skills in project management with agile software development methodologies as Agile Unified Process and SCRUM.
Experience in the CMS Drupal, through its management tools, for web pages creation, also knowledge in module creation via PHP for web pages customizations.
Skills in business model generation using BPMN, (Business process modeling notation). Using the Bizagi Tool.
response.skills: NetSuite, JavaScript, SuiteScript, Desarrollo de páginas web (Back-End), PMP, Implementación de ITIL, Consultoría de TI, Consultoría de software, Desarrollo de software, Gestión de proyectos de programas de software, Software como servicio (SaaS), Diseño de software, Software ERP, Planificación de recursos empresariales (ERP), Gestión de relaciones con atención al cliente (CRM), Scrum, jQuery, HTML, CSS

profile_positions.location: Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
profile_positions.title: Customer Care Data Principal

profile_positions.description:
In charge of design and estimate the customizations for projects in the region.
Defined base process for definition and maintenance of customizations for the region, aiming for software reuse, maintainability, and quality standards.
Trainer/Enabler for team members design and estimate for customizations.
Acted as technical subject matter expert on implementations.
Global reference for customizations for the region, working with NorthAmerica and Europe technical services teams.
profile_positions.title: NetSuite Customer Success Solution Architect

profile_positions.description:
Project manager advocate for the LatinAmerica region. Member of Project Management Office PMO global team.
Received the best regional scores on customer success services survey.
Established base project plan for regional methodology. Defined base templates for implementations according to methodology definitions.
Part of the team of continual improvement for project plans for standardized SuiteSuccess methodology.
profile_positions.title: NetSuite Professional Services Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Established enablement definitions for team development, generating subject matter experts for the different NetSuite modules.
Generated global work connections to enablement, training, product, ACS, pre-sales, sales and implementation teams, to generate sustainable growth for the team and to standardize process for the region.
Defined base training for onboarding team members.
Started technical services team for the region.
profile_positions.title: NetSuite Professional Services Country Manager Argentina

profile_positions.description:
Delivery Lead for SS Starter Implementations project portfolio for the LAD region.
In charge of scope, resources and time for over 50+ projects for the region.
I was part of the global Suite Success team which defined needs and base documentation for the region projects.
profile_positions.title: NetSuite Professional Services SuiteSuccess Starter Delivery Lead

profile_positions.description:
In charge of new project definitions and effort estimations for México and Brazil.
Established templates for region estimates according to localization needs.
Final definitions for proposals in terms of functional/technical and implementation details.
Professional services link to regional sales teams.
profile_positions.title: NetSuite Professional Services Solution Principal

profile_positions.description:
I established the base methodology adaptation for the implementations for the region.
Defined standards and templates for implementations based on the current region methodology.
Acted as subject matter expert on implementations when needed.
profile_positions.title: NetSuite Professional Services Functional Leader

profile_positions.description:
First member of the Professional Services team for LAD Region.
In charge of all customizations on the implementation projects for Oracle NetSuite customers in México. Responsible for the design and management of the professional services localization extension used as base for all the implementations in Mexico, and the migration to the standardized product version. I was part of the team that developed the product analysis and definition for the current Mexico Localization suiteApp for Mexico.
profile_positions.title: NetSuite Professional Services Technical Leader

profile_positions.description:
Functions and achievements: Contributed in different projects as a front-end developer, using technologies such as Shopify development framework, and its programing language Liquid, I was involved in the development of online stores with high customer usage, using knowledge related with technologies such as HTML, CSS, Javascript, JQuery, AJAX, some of the projects I was involved in were: 
•	https://www.rwnbyrawan.com
•	https://www.ikariaresortwear.com
•	https://kendall-kylie.com
Worked in some requirements on the back-end side of the application Dinero Full, using knowledge in thecnologies such as Laravel (PHP) and Angular JavaScript frameworks.
•	https://stg.dinerofull.com.ar
profile_positions.title: Software and Web Developer

profile_positions.description:
Functions and achievements: I contributed to different projects inside this multinational company, among those who stood out the creation of a payroll module inside of NetSuite, according to Colombian legal Requirements, but flexible enough to operate within different legislations. Because of its functionalities it was implemented in above thirty client accounts, in fourteen countries of LATAM, with a range of eight thousand employee’s payroll calculation.
Another project that stood out was the workflow design and implementation via SuiteFlow for the opportunities and Sales Orders for the PayU company, with a range of seven countries and around of two hundred NetSuite users, for over ten thousand clients.  
As part of the responsibilities I was in charge of, I give support for the customers around LATAM. Aplying knowledge in JavaScript, using JSON objects for web services Comunication, worked with SOAP and REST architectures.
profile_positions.title: Principal Solutions Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Functions and achievements: I worked as TI and technical support Leader, with responsibilities that  include the creation of marketing campaigns for the technology courses offered by Indudata, using HTML and CSS programing capabilities, in conjunction with Infusion CRM management.
Was also in charge of the follow up of the customers using the CRM Infusion. My responsabilities also included the correct configuration, management and operation of the internal network. 
I lead and develop a software project mainly in JAVA that allows the optimization of the main process of the company, the search and classification of potential profiles to fill the diferent positions related with the projects the company was involved in form public tenders.
I worked as data analyst in the bidding area, where I was in charge of the process of bids opportunities search, elaboration of tenders and resolution of estate entities requirements.
profile_positions.title: TI and technical Support Leader, Software Developer

education.degree_name: Master in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence

company.name: PedidosYa
company.description: We’re  the delivery market leader in Latin America. Our platform connects over 77.000 restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies and stores with millions of users. Nowadays we operate in more than 500 cities in Latinamerica. And we are now over 3.400 employees. PedidosYa is available for iOS, Android and Windows Phone operating systems and downloads are now over 20 million.

location.raw: Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
